title: AUTHOR OF A LIE
shortDescription: This rhythm-driven Pop/Hip-Hop fusion tracks the dismantling of a partner's false narrative. The song is highly confrontational and sarcastic.
snippetA: You're the author of a lie, a master of deceit
fullLyrics:
[Verse 1]
You tell a story, i pick it apart
Your timeline is whacked, you're playing a part
Said you were dancing on the beach in july
and the tide was high and the moon was in the sky
I'm like, "wait a minute, that don't add up to me"
Your whole memory's a movie fantasy
The sun was out, the clouds were gray
And you were playing video games all day
But when i start to get angry and vent
Then you deflect, make up stuff and rewrite events
You rewrite the stars, you rewrite the past
Playing fast and loose, nothin's built to last

[Chorus]
You're the author of a lie, a master of deceit
And i'm tired of this story on repeat

[Verse 2]
You sent a text at 2 am
Said you were home, busy working late again but
I saw a picture tagged in front of a neon bar
An arm over a shoulder, in your co-workers car
Ya said "oh, that wasn't me, that was a look-alike, babe!"
Man, your excuses are all just a big charade
You look me in the eye and sell me this line
You're a broken record, wasting my time

[Pre-Chorus]
'Cause when i start to get angry and vent
Then you deflect, make up stuff and rewrite events
You rewrite the stars, you rewrite the past
Playing fast and loose, nothin's built to last

[Repeat Chorus]
You're the author of a lie, a master of deceit
And i'm tired of this story on repeat

[Bridge]
One little lie leads to a house of glass
Trying to fool me, but you're running out of gas
I see the cracks, the holes in your alibi
Every time you open your mouth, boom, another lie
I'm over it, i'm done, i'm walking away
From this little game you're playing every single day

[Outro]
Yeah, tired of this fiction, tired of the pretense
No more of your stories, they lack common sense
Rewrite this, lie, rewrite that, yeah, you rewrite events
Looking real bad
(I'm not buying it, no, not ever again)
(Not ever again)
fantasy world has come to an end
(Fade out)

title: HIT THE ROAD
shortDescription: Vengeful anthem about moving on from a toxic relationship. Empowerment-focused pop.
fullLyrics:
(Verse 1) All those nights you laid in my bed, All those times you messed with my head. You told me lie after lie, And yeah, I cried a lot back then, but my tears are now dry. (Pre-Chorus) I'm not gonna yell or spend hours tryna get you out the door. I've been that fool so many times before. You did me foul, you did me wrong, so I moved on. Time for you to get gone.

(Chorus) Don't stop, don't look back, Hit the road, Jack, I don't want you back!

(Verse 2) My friends never liked you, they all want you gone. You did me so dirty, boy, you did me so wrong. I was so blinded, so into you, I lost myself, it's true. Thank God you're gone, 'cause they say it's darkest before the dawn.

(Pre-Chorus) I'm not gonna tell you off, or spend hours tryna get you out my door. I've been that fool so many times before. You're shady as hell, so I moved on, done with being treated so wrong. Time to get gone!

(Chorus) Don't stop, don't look back, Hit the road, Jack, I don't want you back! I truly don't want you back, don't come back.

(Bridge) Let's get this straight now, it's all because of how you treated me. And if you're thinking of me and wondering, here's my answer: You wanna send a DM? Haha, I blocked you on all that stuff. You think I still have feelings? Haha, you're out of luck. You think I'm missing you? Haha, that ain't true. You wanna hear from me? Hahaha, nope, we're through.

(Outro) My friends despise you, they're glad you're gone. I'm glad you're gone too, 'cause now I can find someone who doesn't treat me wrong. I can finally move on. Just don't bother to try and hit me up, You better think twice, 'cause that door is closed. Yeah, it's a dead end

title: I KNOW YOUR DAMN PIN CODE
shortDescription: Breakup anthem of uncovering a partner's deceit and finding empowerment.
snippetA: Think you're clever? I know your damn pin code.
fullLyrics:
[Heavy, distorted guitar intro] Think you're clever? I've been through this and even more. You're not clever. Been through this too many times before. I know what to look for and I know where to snoop. I know what to open. YEP, FOUND IT.... swish through the hoop. [swish sound] [crowd cherring] Gave me bullets for my gun I named Justice, yeah. Now I'm gonna aim and shoot, no more holding back tears. Silly me! Believing you when you said you love me true. Said you wouldn't ever cheat, stay by my side, me and you.

(Chorus) You think you're clever? And I can't get in your phone. You're not clever. I know your damn pin code. [your birthday] You think you're clever? Those excuses you told. [so lame] You're not clever. The truth unfolds. You think you're clever? And the truth I will never know. You're not clever. Your stories have too many holes, [I watch 'em grow.]

(Bridge) Eff you for hurting me and eff you for the lies. I don't care about reasons, excuses or why's. Eff off, kick rocks. I don't want you no more. Eff off, get gone. I'm slamming the door.

(Chorus) You think you're clever? And I can't get in your phone. You're not clever. I know your damn pin code. You think you're clever? Those excuses you told. You're not clever. The truth unfolds.

(Bridge Part 2) No room in this silly girl's heart anymore, you hear? You won't have what's between my thighs, not even near. But I'm not like those dumb girls you had in your past. You turned out to be more boy than man, your moment didn't last. [Guitar Solo - raw and powerful]

(Outro) I know I can do better, perfect timing, can't you see? Here comes better, yeah, better is coming for me. I found a new man. 'Cause I can.

title: HOW'S IT FEEL, BRO?
shortDescription: A confrontational track about watching the consequences finally catch up with a liar.
snippetA: Here you go again, spinning that story but now it boomerangs back.
fullLyrics:
Yo, before you go, it's your turn. 

Verse 1
Don't want to hear that you didn't make it home 'cause you fell asleep in the car
I already heard that one before
You can't run out if you get gas before you go and the weather is beautiful, no rain or snow.

You're just like all the others
always hanging with your bro’s but,
Getting all mad if it's me, though
Here you go again, spinning that story but now it boomerangs back, and like glue, it sticks.
How's it feel, bro?

You earned this one...
Yeah, how's it feel, bro?

[Verse 2]
Coming home at dawn 'cause the front tire was flat. Shouldn't take all night, With a spare and a jack, Thought you were smarter than that.

Remember when you said,
When it's over just come home, no need to roam. 
"If something happens, use your phone." Oh, the cell phone is dead? Well then l use your friends instead.

Don't treat me like a fool and say you don't talk to other girls
Remember when we met? You had a girl then, too,
But you were talking to me all day.
Yeah, You were talking to me all day.

[Verse 3]
You're always getting all hot, being all mad,
Like I'm the one who's doing something bad.
But the air you're breathing, the lies you're spinning,
That's your game, and bro, you're not winning.

Even my shadow is standing different while I'm calling out your future admissions,
Covering all the bases, you seem allergic to good decisions.
Yes, I'm calling out every place that you have been so I don't have to hear it again.Yo

How's it feel, bro?
You earned this one...
Yeah, how's it feel, bro?

So, before you appease me with your regret, if you try these, again you're going to see upset. The same old you won't do it again.
History repeats, so we know you will. Which means I'll probably forgive you too.That's how it's always been.

Yeah, that's how it's always been.
How's it feel bro? Oh, and have fun.

title: YEAR IN THE REARVIEW
shortDescription: Analyzing the path traveled and deciding to move forward without looking back.
snippetA: A year in the rearview since that shattering crash.
fullLyrics:
(Verse 1) Three hundred sixty-five sunsets bled into the night Since the slammed door echoed, stealing all the light A calendar circled, each day a heavy stone Building this fortress, standing here alone The ghosts of your laughter still danced in the air A constant whisper, a burden hard to bear Every shared secret, a sharp little sting A melody broken, the silence it would bring

(Chorus) A year in the rearview since that shattering crash A year just to glue the broken pieces from the ash Washing away the bitterness, letting the hurt unwind Guess it'll take another year, to truly leave the poison behind

(Verse 2) Sleepless hours counting cracks upon the wall Haunted by phone calls I refused to make at all Your name on a street sign, a punch to the gut it brings Like a phantom limb aching, for the touch that love once sings I cursed your memory, then cursed my foolish pride Lost in the labyrinth where broken promises hide The "should haves" and "could bes," a loop inside my head Wishing I'd seen the storm clouds gathering overhead

(Chorus) A year in the rearview since that shattering crash A year just to glue the broken pieces from the ash Washing away the bitterness, letting the hurt unwind Guess it'll take another year, to truly leave the poison behind

(Bridge) They say time's a healer, a softly spoken lie When the scars run deeper than the naked eye can spy This knot in my stomach, a reminder sharp and keen Of whispered betrayals and the love that turned unclean But I'm peeling back layers, like bark from a wounded tree Reclaiming the silence, finally setting me free This anger's a wildfire, I'm letting the embers fade Planting new seeds now, in the garden we once made

(Chorus) A year in the rearview since that shattering crash A year just to glue the broken pieces from the ash Washing away the bitterness, letting the hurt unwind Guess it'll take another year, to truly leave the poison behind

(Outro) Yeah, another year stretching, on this open road Leaving your shadow, lightening my heavy load I'm stepping into sunlight, with a hopeful, steady gaze Turning the page now, on those hazy, hurtful days A year has passed, and the healing's begun to bloom Sweeping the darkness from this quiet room No more poison, no more bitter sting. Just the quiet promise of what tomorrow might bring.

title: YOUR MASK
shortDescription: Exposing the face underneath the performance of a nefarious actor.
snippetA: Rip your f-ing mask off, see the face that's underneath.
fullLyrics:
You see me on the screen, a monster in the news
A headline and a mugshot, singing all the blues
They paint me with no colors, a black and grey villain in your play
But you're the one who pulled the strings, and now we've gotta pay

[Chill, reggae-style rhythm] 
The promises you whispered, the deals you made in shade
The innocent you trampled, the future you betrayed
You watched the whole damn structure burn, with a sick and twisted grin
Now you want to blame the ashes for the mess we're in!

You think I'm TROUBLE! You think I'm DANGEROUS!
A ticking time bomb, a force that you can't trust!
But rip your f-ing mask off, see the face that's underneath
It's your nefarious actions that have brought us to our knees!

[Explode into punk-rock feel]
The system's gears are grinding, a symphony of rust
Built on broken promises, and monuments of dust
You threw us to the wolves, and then you blamed the scars
And washed your hands of all the mess you created, now I'm gonna rot behind bars!

[Pull back to reggae rhythm]
You think I'm TROUBLE! You think I'm DANGEROUS!
A savage beast you can't control, a sickness born from us!
But rip your f-ing mask off, see the face that's underneath
It's your nefarious actions that have brought us to our knees!

Yeah, the fire's burning, you just lit the match
You watched the whole thing spiral, knew you couldn't catch
Now the smoke is clearing, and the truth is coming out
And you're standing in the wreckage, what's it all about?!

[Outro]
To our knees...
Your actions... have brought us... to our knees...
You see me on the screen, a monster in the news
A headline and a mugshot, singing all the blues
They paint me with no colors, a black and grey villain in your play
But you're the one who pulled the strings, and now we've gotta pay

title: THE BACK OF ME
shortDescription: The final image of a person walking away for good, reclaiming their future.
snippetA: Stop! Before you go too far now, there’s no turning back.
fullLyrics:
Verse 1
Stop! Before you go too far now, there’s no turning back.
You better change your direction, you’ve got to reverse the whole track.
I almost just said which drawer your favorite shirt is kept
while my heart is hurting, watching you pack.
You aren't giving us enough time to fix this. Oh, no.

Chorus
You don't know what it could have been, would have been,
That's hurting us more, you know, and it's a sin.
I don't want to mess with those other men.
You should not walk out the door, should not give up on us, not now.

Verse 2
You should not stick with this plan. I don't know what to say or do,
I just don't understand why you aren't fighting for us.
But I don't want to make a huge fuss. I'm doing the best that I can.
You’re so wrong, it’s a bad idea, really—
destroying us is the heart of your plan.
You won't have me, no, no, no.
And I won't come running, and all you will see is the back of me when you leave.

Bridge
Are you trying to have your cake and eat it, too? That’s just a lie, a scam.
If it’s space you desire, to be alone in your room, I’ll be quiet.
I can give you that and more; I can even silence a riot.

Chorus
You don't know what it could have been, would have been,
This is hurting us more than you know, and it's a sin.
I don't want to mess with those other men.
You should not walk out the door, should not give up on us, not now.
I would have given you everything you want and need, but you chose to just leave.

Verse 3
It’ll hit you hard when your façade begins disintegrating,
'cause that head held high and that confidence you're feeling inside
is an illusion created—a mere imitation of a man I made you
by building you up and never complaining.
And what’s left is the fact that this broken-spirited man who lacks
won't have me back, and all he can see is the back of me.

Outro
Stop! You think I'll be here when you return, a statue carved in tears?
That I'll unpack the hope you crushed and dry away my little fears?
You're banking on my weakness, on a love you can abuse?
Well, the story ends right now, and it's a chapter you will lose.
I'm done waiting for a sign, for a choice you won't commit to.
My patience is the door that I am walking straight right through.
You wanted space? Fine. You can have the whole damn room,
but when I'm gone, that silence will feel like a tomb.

[Climax]
All you will see when you turn back to look is the back of me.

[Outro continued]
The whisper of my coat sleeve, the echo of my sole,
Walking through and shutting the door—
The sound is so deafening that it swallows up your whole
silly, selfish dream of having it all.
And then you're left there, standing alone,
not getting me anymore.
Just that one last frame:
The back of me, and yourself to blame

title: SHOWDOWN AT MY DOOR
shortDescription: The definitive moment of standing your ground when the past comes knocking.
snippetA: Don't you dare think 'bout a showdown at my door.
fullLyrics:
Layin' here in bed, prayin' when you get home
You don't start a fight, leave my soul alone
Accusin' me of bein' lazy, puttin' us in debt
Blamin' me for everything you can't forget
You play your sick games, messin' with my head, my light
Told your lies, stayed out, never comin' home at night
Used to cry those tears, but the river don't flow no more
I'm not the girl you used to know, from before

Don't you dare think 'bout a showdown at my door
Been down that dusty road a hundred times before
You're no good to me, yeah, the truth is plain to see
So it's time to move on, don't stop, don't look back, just get gone
'Cause I don't want you, you're not welcome anymore

You can't control me now, might as well just mosey out that door
You can kick your rocks, I'm changin' the locks, I'm so done with you
Shhh, don't you say a word, there's nothin' new to say
Nothin' I haven't heard, so just get on your way
Yeah, I want less talk and more walk, baby, we are through

Don't you dare think 'bout a showdown at my door
Been down that dusty road a hundred times before, for sure
You don't deserve me, yeah, the truth is clear to see
So it's time to move on, don't stop, don't look back, just get gone
Yeah, I don't need you anymore

Thought you could slide into my DMs, playin' it cool?
[Scoffs] Lol, I blocked you, what a fool!
Still thinkin' my love is just for you?
[Laughs] Well, bless your heart, but that ain't true!

[Outro]
Yeah, I'm movin' on, I'm done with you, I'm gone
Don't you even try to hit me up, 'cause if you do, you'll get messed up.

title: GEN X 80s ANTHEM
shortDescription: A tribute to a generation raised on grit, cassette tapes, and independence.
snippetA: They say Gen X is the best, yeah, I believe it's true.
fullLyrics:
They say Gen X is the best, yeah, I believe it's true, 

The 80's tubular, everything brand new. Wanting to change my clothes, my hair, my face. A big shifting scene 

CC's guitar talked to me that night, Raw electric whisper in neon light.

I love rock and roll, energy and sound, Vince and I hot for our teacher, all around.

I think we're alone now so i Gave a rose with thorns, a teenage, bold display. Sister Christian didn't appreciate it, told me to go away.  

Shot through the heart, yeah, we took the blame,

Mr. Telephone Man messed with my line, every time.

I'm Walkin' like an Egyptian, so walk this way too, grand,

Drinking red red wine dancing in the dark, hand in hand.

Just wanna know what love is, Is it in the air tonight.

Are my Sweet dreams made of these, compare all right.

Just wake me up before you go go! Don't leave me hanging on cause i'm too shy but


I want to dance with somebody, feel that beat,

'Cause us girls just wanna have fun on the street.

Like a virgin, heart open wide,

So pour some sugar on me, good times ride.

Every lyric makin' sense, 80's we unfold

Dancing Queen in the arcade, flashing lights aglow,

After a bloody Sunday, somber undertow.

Then Manic Monday, week dragging slow,

A cruel cruel summer, where the good times go? Got a blister in the sun. Then went home sweet home Listening to the radio a comforting old friend.


Cassette tapes click, Mix tapes were it. Break dancing to the hits 


Shot through the heart, we took the blame,

Video killed the radio star, things never the same. Nightmare on Elm street, now a street with no name, Goonies always stand by me but got away cuz Marty would lean on me, love them movies to this day. That's the power of love they say.


Against the wind, we pushed through, strong bold, to ride da double dutch bus, where le freak stories told. Missed the crazy train, left without a sound. 


Wanna shout shout shout, letting it out, while losing my religion. Under the milky way.

Behind the bushes screaming more more more, 

Like a rebel yell, passion release.

I wanna know what love is, under the killing moon. Is it like walking on sunshine ? I'll know soon.


Should I stay or should I go? I still haven't found what I'm looking for in this mad mad world everybody is trying to rule.


Who's that girl? Rio. Billie Jean. I just wanna dance with somebody under the purple rain. She can't drive 55, so why dont you jump [jump!] for your love. we'll fight for party rights. So don't you forget about me, cuz I was there. I'm bad! can't deny.

Every breath you take in for light, then exit night, take on me neath the sky.

Feels Just like heaven, making circles in the sand. We just need a little patience, a gentle hand.

Just Enjoy the silence, sweet child of mine

title: SHOT BY CUPIDS DART
shortDescription: The sweet, disorienting rush of a new attraction taking hold.
snippetA: When I first saw you, I thought, 'Damn, he's so fine'
fullLyrics:
When I first saw you, I thought, "Damn, he's so fine"

Then I talked to you, and you really blew my mind

In that moment, I knew, another like you, I'd never find

So I had to have you, 'cause you're truly one of a kind


Oh baby, baby, you have my heart

Oh my baby, baby, it's time to start

A life together, I'll be yours forever

Together forever, shot by Cupid's dart

 

If you don't believe me and you think I'm telling lies

Just look up to heaven, 'cause Cupid's darts are flying high

Ladies, don't get discouraged and don't be too surprised

When you get shot by Cupid's dart, right between the eyes

He'll love you forever, you'll be his forever

Together forever, got shot by Cupid's dart


We got shot, shot, shot by Cupid's dart

Shot, shot, shot by Cupid's dart

Together forever, we'll never part

Shot by Cupid's dart


[Outro]

You're in my heart’

title: MY GIRL KARMA
shortDescription: A smooth, calculated warning that what goes around always comes back with interest.
snippetA: My girl Karma is coming your way.
fullLyrics:
Verse 1
My girl Karma is coming your way
You'll meet her in a year, a month, or maybe even today
She's got a method for finding just you, no doubt
What you throw out, she'll return with a BANG, watch out.
She collects her debt, it's the universal way
Balancing things out, night and day.

Chorus
What goes around, comes back, it's a fact
She's like a boomerang, always circling back
My girl Karma is watching, she never forgets
She's always coming to collect, on that you can bet!
Yeah, what you throw out, she'll return with a BANG!, watch out.

Verse 2
You reap whatcha sow, you'll know it's true
When you come home to roost, she'll be waiting for you.
Wanna die by the sword? She'll grant your wish
My girl Karma is coming for you, sealed with a karmic kiss
Don’t try her, cause my girl don't play.

Chorus
What goes around, comes back, it's a fact
She's like a boomerang, always circling back
My girl Karma is watching, she never forgets
She's always coming to collect, on that you can bet!
Yeah, what you throw out, she'll return with a BANG!, watch out.

Bridge
She has no menu. Your order’s been on reserve.
So, trust she will serve what you truly deserve…

Outro [The Balance]
She collects her debt, it's the universal way...
You done the right? She doesn't need a receipt.
She knows the deposit, and she always pays sweet.
Just be a good person…damn.

title: MARRIED TO THE DRUG
shortDescription: Comparing a destructive relationship to the chemical grip of an addiction.
snippetA: Married to the drug, Mrs. Fetty, hand in hand.
fullLyrics:
I don't need a friend who's a fiend, a leach Tree Shade 
Always on survival mode, you picked me just to take away.
You knocked on my life's door, why?
What did you come here for?  
Condemnation without just compensation is your calling card
You left me hollowed out and frail, a November pumpkin
No stopping on red, you burned me over and over again like a lake of fire floats all your sins
An overbearing presence, a ship that's destined to fail.
You don't know the first thing 'bout honesty, or keeping things true
Just a serious, gaping void where morality should accrue.
'Cause you're the energy drain, the life-sucker, the weight
You leave me breathless, flatlined, sealed by a desperate fate.
Married to the drug, Mrs. Fetty, hand in hand
Took her last name caus with your new wife your a submissive man
You made your choice, now leave my light, and let me reclaim my life.
You were shady even more than a tree in the dark
A master of deception, always hitting below the mark.
You kept your promises brittle, your word a flimsy lie
that smirk when you watched me break and cry.
You move like a ghost, a viper, a creature that hides from the light
parasite sucking me dry or mindless zombie body twisted at the corner light
Leaving nothing but rubble a deadly megaquake,  
A coiled danger, ready to strike, slippery snake


'Cause you're the energy drain, the life-sucker, the weight
You leave me breathless, flatlined, sealed by a desperate fate.
Married to the drug, Mrs Fetty, a black widow
You made your choice, now leave my light, it's time to go


I will reclaim my life.


You thought you had me trapped here, in your cycle of take and spend
But this is where your hold breaks, this is where my misery ends.
The door is slammed, the lock is turned, I'm finding the strength to stand tall
You can't steal my future, you can't have my soul, you can't have it all.


[Outro]
No more fiending around me, no more putting me in debt, different air I breathe been choking since the day we met
So, go on hide in that shadow, be that tree shade... 
Your hold on me is broken, nothing left worth saying

title: TAKE THAT FIRST STEP
shortDescription: An empowering call to action about overcoming fear and starting a new chapter.
snippetA: Just take the first step and give this a real try.
fullLyrics:
[slow emotional power ballad]

VERSE 1
It hurts my heart to watch you go through this,
I wanna take your pain away, but feel so helpless.
For years it's been hard to watch you stray,
And I pray that healing starts and ends your pain today.
I'll be here if you need me, not with money to lend;
I will not enable but I’ll be a true friend.
My love is unconditional, and it's always free;
Use my shoulder to cry on, just lean on me.


VERSE 2
Talk to me, please, open up; I promise I won't judge.
I will listen to you, and hold no grudge; let me share too. 
When you feel like everything is broken, trust me, it's only bent;
Together we can fix it,just commit and take the first step.


You said a while back that you'd get on the right track,
And keep on pushing forward, even when the pressure’s stacked.
You gave enough years to always doing it your way;
Let's try a different path, starting with this very day.


CHORUS
'Cause I love you, and I don't want you to die. No.
Not from the drugs, or from running the streets high.
So I'm begging you now, let's save your life. 
Just take the first step and give this a real try.


BRIDGE
I can no longer sit idly as your dreams pass you by. No.
How can you expect me to keep watching you slowly die. No-oo0
I know there's pain, I do.
See the fear in my eyes, cause
I don't want my final word to you to be a goodbye. No.
I don't want my last time being with you is when your casket is lowered.
With tears streaming down my face, and screaming, "Why?"
No, no, no, I don't ever wanna say goodbye. No.
So please, don't ever give up trying.
I don't want my final word to you to be a goodbye. No.


OUTRO
I'm right here... for you.
Just take that first step.
I'm right here... no matter how many steps are left.
